tr_quotes.quote: Bildiğim bir tek özgürlük vardır o da aklın özgürlüğüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

tr_quotes.quote: Ey özgürlük! Adalet varsa sen de varsın.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük, tarihin kaybolmayan tek değeridir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyet, milletlerin ebedi gençliğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Manuel Foy

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük, adaletten başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Allah bize hayatı verirken, hürriyeti de verdi.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Yelken ol, kürek ol, dümen ol, balık ol, su ol; git gidebildiğin yere.
tr_quotes.author: Orhan Veli

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük ekmekten tatlı, güneşten güzeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Ekmeksiz yaşarım, hürriyetsiz yaşayamam.
tr_quotes.author: Said Nursi

tr_quotes.quote: Korkun seni mahkum eder, umudun seni özgür bırakır.
tr_quotes.author: Esaretin Bedeli

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine yeterliliğin en güzel meyvesi, hürriyettir.
tr_quotes.author: Epicuros

tr_quotes.quote: Nefsinden feragat etmeyen, gerçek hürriyete kavuşamaz.
tr_quotes.author: A. J. Cronin

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa dilsiz hayvanlara bile, özgürlük vermiştir.
tr_quotes.author: P. C. Tacitus

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyete karşı güveni kalmayan bir cemiyet, derhal yıkılır.
tr_quotes.author: John Simon

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük bir kişinin değil, herkesin hakkıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

tr_quotes.quote: Anımsamak bir tür buluşmadır. Unutmak ise bir tür özgürlük.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: Akıl sana ait değilse, ruhun özgür kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan hür olmadan, huzurlu ve mesut olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Dante Aiighieri

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyet, hürriyetin ne olduğunu bilmeyenin hakkı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Şehabeddin

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyeti, en iyi demokratik rejimler sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Robert P. Patterson

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük, yasaların izin verdiği her şeyi yapmak hakkıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının hürriyetlerini tanımayanlar, hürriyete layık değildirler.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak kendi kendisini yönetebilen, akıllı insanlar özgürdür.
tr_quotes.author: Horatius

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların özgürlüğü, kendisine yapılanlara karşı takındığı tavırda gizlidir.
tr_quotes.author: J. Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ülkede ne kadar çok tabu varsa o kadar özgürlük yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyet hiçbir vakit hapsedilmez, hatta o tazyike uğradığı nisbette genişler.
tr_quotes.author: La Cordaire

tr_quotes.quote: Vicdanınız temizse özgürsünüz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluğun sırrı özgürlüktür, özgürlüğün sırrı ise cesarettir.
tr_quotes.author: Tukidides

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyeti ve hayatı hak edenler, onu her gün fethetmek zorunda kalmazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına da vermeden sahip olamayacağımız tek şey hürriyettir.
tr_quotes.author: William Allen White

tr_quotes.quote: Başkasının özgürlüğüne saygı gösterelim; ama aynı zamanda bayrağımızı da koruyalım.
tr_quotes.author: Frederic Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk uğrunda gerekirse hayatımı veririm; fakat hürriyet uğrunda aşkımı da feda ederim.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyet, ancak hürriyetini her gün yeniden kazanan insana layıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, ancak alışkanlıklarına gem vurabilecekleri nisbette, hürriyete hak kazanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

tr_quotes.quote: Savaşları kazanabilir kentleri zapt edebilirsiniz; ama ulusları fethedemezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlüğünden vazgeçen kimse, insanlıktan, hak ve görevlerinden vazgeçmiş demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyetsiz ahlak mevcut olmayacağından, onsuz vazife ve mesuliyet de olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: John Simon

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük sorumluluk getirir, insanların çoğunun özgürlükten korkması bundandır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Anımsamak bir tür buluşmadır. Unutmak ise bir tür özgürlük.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı, hürriyeti ancak onu sevenlere ve onu muhafaza ve savunmaya hazır olanlara verir.
tr_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak tutkulardan önce hakka yer veren bir ülkede, gerçek özgürlük var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: La Cordaire

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan özgürlüğü başkasından dilenenez, özgürlüğü kazanmasını bilmesi gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: lgnazio Silone

tr_quotes.quote: Kim özgürlüğün bereketlerinden yararlanmak isterse ona yardım etmek sıkıntısına katlanmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlüğünden vazgeçen kimse, insanlıktan, hak ve görevlerinden vazgeçmiş demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisine istediği özgürlükleri başkalarından esirgeyen kişi, ne adam olabilir ne özgür.
tr_quotes.author: William Allen White

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük ve güvence arasında zıtlık değil bağlılık vardır, ya ikisi de olur ya da hiçbiri olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Romsery Clark

tr_quotes.quote: Hürriyet ilk kök salmaya başladığı devrede, gelişmesi çok hızlı olan bir bitkidir.
tr_quotes.author: George Washington

tr_quotes.quote: En güzel özgürlük kölelerin düşlerinde gördüğüdür, özgürlüğün korkutucu yanlarını bilmez köleler.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Kanun yaptıktan sonra ona gönül rızası ile itaat etmek, hürriyetin en yüksek bir iradesi değil midir?
tr_quotes.author: La Cordaire

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük ağacı arada sırada zorba zalimlerin kanıyla sulanmalıdır, çünkü bu onun doğal gübresidir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlüğün yolu tüm dünyaya karşı tek başına kalmak bile olsa, kendi inancına bağlı kalmaktan geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

en_quotes.quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right
en_quotes.author: Brigham Young

en_quotes.quote: There is no dignity quite so impressive, and no one independence quite so important, as living within your means
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: I was born with a fierce need for independence
en_quotes.author: Michelle Williams

en_quotes.quote: I know of no country in which there is so little independence of mind and real freedom of discussion as in America
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more precious than independence and liberty
en_quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

en_quotes.quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Independence? That's middle class blasphemy. We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: My mother told me to be a lady. And for her, that meant be your own person, be independent
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: Mickey Mouse is, to me, a symbol of independence. He was a means to an end
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: I have an independent streak. You know, it's kind of hard to tell a independent woman what to do
en_quotes.author: Betty Ford

en_quotes.quote: The love of independence and dislike of unjust treatment is the source of a thousand virtues
en_quotes.author: William Godwin

en_quotes.quote: Independence Day,' ever since we did it, there's been enormous pressure to follow it up
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: Injustice in the end produces independence
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Independence did not mean chauvinism and narrow nationalism
en_quotes.author: Said Musa

en_quotes.quote: In the progress of personality, first comes a declaration of independence, then a recognition of interdependence
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: I'm lucky because I remember my dad showing me 'Independence Day,' and I loved it
en_quotes.author: Maika Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Originality is independence, not rebellion; it is sincerity, not antagonism
en_quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Fox was interested in a different title to 'Independence Day.'
en_quotes.author: Bill Pullman

en_quotes.quote: Honoring our nation's heroes and their caregivers is a cause very important to me - especially on Independence Day
en_quotes.author: Joey Chestnut

en_quotes.quote: As for 'Independence Day,' we never intended to do any films in that series beyond the first one
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: There is no more independence in politics than there is in jail
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: It is very nearly impossible... to become an educated person in a country so distrustful of the independent mind
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: What you get free costs too much
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: The most unpardonable sin in society is independence of thought
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: Nationality is the miracle of political independence; race is the principle of physical analogy
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: It's so important to have that independence. You know it yourself: Everyone needs evenings of their own
en_quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: We do need a return to individual integrity, self-reliance, and old-fashioned gumption. We really do
en_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

en_quotes.quote: Work means independence. It allowed me to shape my life on so many levels
en_quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

en_quotes.quote: The scale of 'Independence Day' is much more than 'Stargate.'
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: There's no such thing as an independent person
en_quotes.author: Peter Jennings

en_quotes.quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man's initiative and independence
en_quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

en_quotes.quote: There is a core independence and dignity you get when you control your own time
en_quotes.author: Travis Kalanick

en_quotes.quote: Independence doesn't mean you decide the way you want
en_quotes.author: Stephen Breyer

en_quotes.quote: I'm for economic independence
en_quotes.author: Charles Evers

en_quotes.quote: If you think Independence Day is America's defining holiday, think again. Thanksgiving deserves that title, hands-down
en_quotes.author: Tony Snow

en_quotes.quote: The American Dream is independence and being able to create that dream for yourself
en_quotes.author: Marsha Blackburn

en_quotes.quote: Solitude is independence
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: I don't have luxurious tastes or great needs, but my independence is worth a lot to me
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

en_quotes.quote: Africans require, want, the franchise on the basis of one man one vote. They want political independence
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: Instead of being taught independence, energy, and enterprise, our youth today is taught to look for security
en_quotes.author: B. Carroll Reece

en_quotes.quote: Independence means you decide according to the law and the facts
en_quotes.author: Stephen Breyer

en_quotes.quote: The toddler craves independence, but he fears desertion
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Corkille Briggs

en_quotes.quote: Throughout the day no time for memorandums now. Go ahead! Liberty and independence forever
en_quotes.author: Davy Crockett

en_quotes.quote: I've never joined any organization - not even the ones I've organized myself. I prize my own independence too much
en_quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

en_quotes.quote: The good man is he who rules himself as he does his own property: his autonomous being is modelled on material power
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: Great research universities must insist on independence from government and on the exercise of academic freedom
en_quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

en_quotes.quote: It is not the greatness of a man's means that makes him independent, so much as the smallness of his wants
en_quotes.author: William Cobbett

en_quotes.quote: Without moral and intellectual independence, there is no anchor for national independence
en_quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

en_quotes.quote: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick
en_quotes.author: Candice Bergen

en_quotes.quote: There are beautiful words in the Bible and in our pledges and the Declaration of Independence
en_quotes.author: Louis Gossett, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: We are totally committed to ending partition and to creating the conditions for unity and independence
en_quotes.author: Gerry Adams

en_quotes.quote: Declaring independence was the most traumatic decision I had to live up to. Because I didn't want to do it
en_quotes.author: Ian Smith

en_quotes.quote: Impatience is the mark of independence, not of bondage
en_quotes.author: Marianne Moore

en_quotes.quote: I value my independence a lot, and the thought of having to lose that due to age or any other reason terrifies me
en_quotes.author: R. Madhavan

en_quotes.quote: I am so old-fashioned. I've never lived with a man. I am completely about the independence of paying my own rent
en_quotes.author: Suheir Hammad

en_quotes.quote: Self-determination could mean independence, confederacy, federal and autonomy
en_quotes.author: Jalal Talabani

en_quotes.quote: International law says people fighting for self-determination can use force in order to achieve their independence
en_quotes.author: Norman Finkelstein

en_quotes.quote: My government has promised to comprehensively respect the independence of the judiciary
en_quotes.author: Victor Ponta

en_quotes.quote: Our forbears worked hard this difficult land, and their reward was the freedom and independence of self-sufficiency
en_quotes.author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: My feeling is that maintaining financial independence is also a healthy way to keep my feet on the ground
en_quotes.author: Valerie Trierweiler

en_quotes.quote: In July, 1892, fate suddenly granted me financial independence
en_quotes.author: Carl Spitteler

en_quotes.quote: The world is independent of my will
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

en_quotes.quote: Our military might is the guarantor of Russia's security and independence
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: Mad, adj. Affected with a high degree of intellectual independence
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Whatever we do toward energy independence has to be done in the context of using less resources
en_quotes.author: Alan Mulally

en_quotes.quote: The most dangerous thing in the world is the sin of self-reliance and the stupor of worldliness
en_quotes.author: John Piper

en_quotes.quote: I admire the courage and self-reliance it takes to start your own business and make it succeed
en_quotes.author: Martha Stewart

en_quotes.quote: The Fed's independence is critical
en_quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

en_quotes.quote: Every manly icon the West has ever admired has embodied the very spirit of American independence
en_quotes.author: Steven Crowder

en_quotes.quote: We moved to Zimbabwe when I was five, some years after Zimbabwe had gained independence
en_quotes.author: Danai Gurira

en_quotes.quote: I had fought for my independence and fought for my freedom to do as I chose
en_quotes.author: Kris Kristofferson

en_quotes.quote: I think boarding school does give you an independence
en_quotes.author: Deirdre O'Kane

en_quotes.quote: Stand-up is my favorite thing I've ever done. There's so much independence
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: I think that there is a relatively small number of people who are pushing for independence in Taiwan
en_quotes.author: Fred Thompson

en_quotes.quote: I have grown up alone. I've taken care of myself. I worked, earned money and was independent at 18
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

en_quotes.quote: The same independence that got me into trouble in high school got me praise in college
en_quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

en_quotes.quote: I'm not making any secret of the fact I still believe in independence. We'll continue to argue the case
en_quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

en_quotes.quote: Britain is characterized not just by its independence but, above all, by its openness
en_quotes.author: David Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I work hard, I make my own living and I love it. I like having financial independence
en_quotes.author: Salma Hayek

en_quotes.quote: Energy independence and energy security are really two different things
en_quotes.author: Rex Tillerson

en_quotes.quote: I cannot compromise or inhibit my independence
en_quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

en_quotes.quote: You cannot build character and courage by destroying men's initiative and independence
en_quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

en_quotes.quote: Journalists prize independence - not teamwork
en_quotes.author: Ken Auletta

en_quotes.quote: I think my independence was a big help to getting Judges Roberts and Alito confirmed, and I think that's recognized
en_quotes.author: Arlen Specter

en_quotes.quote: I don't have good business sense. You never get much money for the arts. But I like independence. I like to grow
en_quotes.author: Cyndi Lauper

en_quotes.quote: We believe in government involvement that leads to independence: good schools, quality roads and the best health care
en_quotes.author: Rick Perry

en_quotes.quote: It's important for women to work. They need to keep their independence, to keep earning and being challenged
en_quotes.author: Tamara Mellon

en_quotes.quote: Our clients value our independence as the leading partner of both the established providers and emerging players
en_quotes.author: Pierre Nanterme

en_quotes.quote: We must first and foremost defend Hungary's independence and sovereignty, and, if needed, we must regain it
en_quotes.author: Viktor Orban

en_quotes.quote: Nature never said to me: Do not be poor; still less did she say: Be rich; her cry to me was always: Be independent
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

en_quotes.quote: Energy independence is very important to me
en_quotes.author: Tomi Lahren

en_quotes.quote: Robert Treat Paine was a signer of the Declaration of Independence
en_quotes.author: Treat Williams

en_quotes.quote: It's great that with the Internet, there has come this sense of creative independence
en_quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

en_quotes.quote: I've always been an independent person, but that independence was in the setting of security
en_quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

en_quotes.quote: It feels like animation has a little more independence than traditional sitcoms ever did
en_quotes.author: H. Jon Benjamin

en_quotes.quote: I'm totally committed to the cause of individuality. That's the only thing I stand by: independence
en_quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

en_quotes.quote: We must develop energy independence; we must Make It In America
en_quotes.author: John Garamendi

en_quotes.quote: I'm for absolute autonomy of the individual, and an adult, competent woman has absolute autonomy. It's her choice
en_quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

en_quotes.quote: Energy conservation is the foundation of energy independence
en_quotes.author: Tom Allen

en_quotes.quote: Every American must be guaranteed dignity and independence in their retirement
en_quotes.author: Jan Schakowsky

en_quotes.quote: Football was the best route to obtain my independence
en_quotes.author: John David Washington

en_quotes.quote: Independence is a very subjective assessment
en_quotes.author: P. Chidambaram

en_quotes.quote: For me, the biggest thing with money has always been independence - just the biggest
en_quotes.author: Monica Seles

en_quotes.quote: Independence is the only way Scotland can realise its full political and cultural potential in the 21st century
en_quotes.author: Tariq Ali

en_quotes.quote: Every year thousands of Americans mistakenly refer to Cinco de Mayo as Mexico's Independence Day
en_quotes.author: Joe Baca

en_quotes.quote: One of the principles upon which the E.U. is built is the separation of powers and the independence of the judiciary
en_quotes.author: Frans Timmermans

en_quotes.quote: I do need my independence. I have to have that
en_quotes.author: Carol Vorderman

en_quotes.quote: As I said, men value their independence in a weird way, above practically everything
en_quotes.author: George Weinberg

en_quotes.quote: Independence is not a whim or an ambition. It is the necessary condition of our survival as an ethnic group
en_quotes.author: Aslan Maskhadov

en_quotes.quote: When India got independence, entrepreneurs were seen as a bad lot, as people who would exploit
en_quotes.author: Nandan Nilekani

en_quotes.quote: My mother insists women must have financial independence, which is why I completed my degree in medicine
en_quotes.author: Sai Pallavi

en_quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, one tends to want to evolve evermore towards a place of independence
en_quotes.author: Bennett Miller

en_quotes.quote: Frankly, I love my independence too much to give it up
en_quotes.author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

en_quotes.quote: It is critical that special counsels have the independence and resources they need to lead investigations
en_quotes.author: Thom Tillis

en_quotes.quote: I know this independence is what people like most about my brand
en_quotes.author: Raf Simons

en_quotes.quote: At independence, Tanzania had 350,000 elephants... in 1987, there were only 55,000 elephants left
en_quotes.author: Jakaya Kikwete

en_quotes.quote: I'm always battling how to be in a relationship while simultaneously maintaining my independence and my career
en_quotes.author: Jessica Williams

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big fan of community, and I think independence is over-rated
en_quotes.author: Sally Phillips

en_quotes.quote: Like millions of Scots, I've agonised over whether to go for independence or remain with the Union
en_quotes.author: Rory Bremner

en_quotes.quote: Scotland needs comedy more than ever. With the independence debate, finally after 300 years, reaching room temperature
en_quotes.author: Rory Bremner

en_quotes.quote: There's a way to express femininity and independence and strength without going for hanging fruit
en_quotes.author: Iliza Shlesinger

en_quotes.quote: I think it's empowering for women to be in a relationship or single and have their own independence
en_quotes.author: Ashley Roberts

en_quotes.quote: I think that initial independence is very important; that's what being an entrepreneur is all about
en_quotes.author: Jon Oringer

en_quotes.quote: I think part of the way in which kids develop emotional and psychological resiliency is by having some independence
en_quotes.author: Kim Brooks

en_quotes.quote: The BBC is a victim of its own independence
en_quotes.author: Graham Norton

en_quotes.quote: It's one of the things I respect about Time Warner and Turner: their understanding of CNN's independence
en_quotes.author: Jeff Zucker

en_quotes.quote: We show each day that we are prepared to act as an independence state... Not just in exceptional moments
en_quotes.author: Carles Puigdemont

en_quotes.quote: The independence project in Catalonia is... a peaceful revolution, carried out in suit, shirt, and tie
en_quotes.author: Carles Puigdemont

en_quotes.quote: There's no alternative to Catalan independence
en_quotes.author: Carles Puigdemont

en_quotes.quote: But since independence, Gabon is one of the few countries in Central Africa that enjoys peace and stability
en_quotes.author: Omar Bongo

en_quotes.quote: The Declaration of Independence is a sacred part of American history
en_quotes.author: Paul Gillmor

en_quotes.quote: The independence of the economic sphere was a tenet of faith with Liberalism
en_quotes.author: Francis Parker Yockey

en_quotes.quote: We must do our utmost to preserve our British ally's strategic independence from Europe
en_quotes.author: Richard Perle

en_quotes.quote: To start with, for example this year, 2004, is the bicentennial of Haitian independence
en_quotes.author: Edwidge Danticat

en_quotes.quote: I want to emphasize the fact that the independence of Kosovo should and will be recognized
en_quotes.author: Ibrahim Rugova

en_quotes.quote: I believe that being in a position, as a central bank, to influence economic growth does not mean losing independence
en_quotes.author: Elvira Nabiullina

en_quotes.quote: In January 1776, Thomas Paine issued 'Common Sense,' advocating independence from Great Britain
en_quotes.author: Mike Crapo

en_quotes.quote: A majority in all parties do, I think, want to see local government recover its old vigour and independence
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Mount

en_quotes.quote: I think it is important to let your kids have independence and ownership. Let your kids do what they have a passion for
en_quotes.author: Ted Ligety

en_quotes.quote: I built my entire life on the idea of independence
en_quotes.author: Valerie Trierweiler

en_quotes.quote: I just like my independence and freedom to come and go and not have an entourage
en_quotes.author: Fred Eychaner

en_quotes.quote: When we celebrate American independence, we are celebrating the best sense of an idea, a process in process
en_quotes.author: Rowan Ricardo Phillips

en_quotes.quote: Swaziland is a small part of south-east Africa, the last country in the continent to gain its independence
en_quotes.author: Richard Grant

en_quotes.quote: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers
en_quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

en_quotes.quote: I've tried to maintain my independence in Congress. Sometimes that has meant opposing my own party leaders
en_quotes.author: Collin C. Peterson

en_quotes.quote: People seem to think that life began with the achievement of personal independence
en_quotes.author: Katharine Anthony

en_quotes.quote: I believe that Greenland will achieve independence during the time I am still active in politics
en_quotes.author: Aleqa Hammond

en_quotes.quote: I am dying, but with a strong hope and persuasion that my country will gain her independence
en_quotes.author: David Wooster

en_quotes.quote: The possession of land seems to be a greater gratification to the pride and independence of men
en_quotes.author: George Richards Minot
